description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
description.vi: Ed, một lính đánh thuê bình thường, đột nhiên được triệu hồi tới một nơi kì lạ và thực hiện thử thách "Bị trục xuất khỏi 100 tổ đội anh hùng ở 100 thế giới khác nhau". Cậu đã hoàn thành thử thách nhưng vẫn phải nhận thêm một nhiệm vụ "Hãy nhìn vào kết cục của một trong những thế giới mà cậu đã đi qua" và cậu đã bị sốc khi quay lại đó.
description.pt-br:
Um aventureiro chamado Ed foi expulso de sua equipe porque era considerado inútil, mas em vez de ficar triste e chateado, ele ficou feliz!!?

Acontece que não é sem razão que ele se sente feliz quando é expulso de uma equipe, porque toda vez que isso acontece, ele recebe uma habilidade que o torna ainda mais invencível...

Ed recebeu um teste maluco: ele teria que ser expulso de 100 equipes de Heróis em 100 mundos diferentes antes de poder voltar ao seu mundo original. Finalmente, uma entidade misteriosa e divina disse que ele havia cumprido todas as condições para retornar ao seu mundo original.

No entanto, como condição final, ele é desafiado: "Olhe o destino de um desses mundos de exílio depois que você partiu." E ele fica chocado com o que vê.

"Ok, eu vou fazer isso! Vou voltar para esses 100 mundos e ser banido com uma boa sensação!"

Ed assume um novo desafio: fazer pleno uso das superpoderosas "Habilidades de Exílio" que foram concedidas a cada vez que foi expulso, e desta vez garantir que todos tenham finais felizes.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga

description.en: A manga anthology, based on the first Valkyrie Profile role-playing game "Lenneth". It's a collection of shortstories by various mangaka.

The Hero has defeated the Demon King! But the Princess he meant to save turned out to be a Prince. NEETdom, here he comes, but a life of relaxation surrounded by animes is a pretty sweet deal.  
  
Unfortunately, he gets caught up in millennia old legends, curses, and a twisted plot involving multiple Kingdoms and many dragons. Through and through, though, he'll follow a path of whimsy, even if that involves him palling it up with "villains".
description.ru:
Самая обычная история, в которой самый обычный герой убивает самого обычного сатану. С него падает самый обычный журнал 18+. Самый обычный герой, немного полистав его, идёт спасать самую обычную принцессу, которая оказалась самым обычным принцем. Что же будет делать наш самый обычный герой?

---

(Source: yagami)

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

altTitles.es-la: Robé El Alma del Ranker Número Uno

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

title.en: Can Unpopular Magical Girls Also Date?

description.en:
Chae-na plays the unpopular Clover in [Magical Lucky Stars], the guardian of Madeleine Village.

She feels weak and lacking as a hero, so she lives inconspicuously and endures being an unpopular member. She finds the spotlight uncomfortable and awkward.

However, there is someone who accidentally sees her kindness and falls in love at first sight! It is Red, Seung-chan, a popular member of the [Hyper Rangers of Transcendental Expedition] group that protects the neighboring Eunha Village.

"I fell in love at first sight. I think I like you!"

She is thrilled by the appearance of Red, whom she admires, but refuses to confess, saying that she doesn't even know what kind of person she is... After hearing the heart-fluttering words that she doesn't know anything about you and wants to get to know you more, she eventually runs away.

"There's no way such a wonderful person would like someone like me. There must be some kind of mistake!"

A heart-pounding story about an ultra-popular hero and an unpopular magical girl who accepts his confession!
description.ko:
마들렌 마을을 수호하는 [매지컬 럭키스타즈]에서 비인기 멤버인 클로버를 맡고 있는 '채나. 

본인이 나약하고 영웅으로서도 부족하다고 느끼고 있 기 때문에 눈에 띄지 않고 비인기 멤버여도 감내하며 살고 있다. 스포트라이트를 받는 것이 오히려 불편하고 어색하기까지 한 그녀인데.

하지만 우연히 그녀의 상냥함을 보고 한 눈에 반해버린 이가 있으니! 옆동네 은하 마을을 수호하는 [초월전대 하이퍼레인저] 그룹의 인기 멤버인 레 드, '승찬이다.

"첫눈에 반했습니다. 좋아하게 된 것 같습니다!"

동경하던 레드의 등장에 설레기도 하지만, 자신이 어떤 사람인지 알지도 못하지 않냐며 고백을 거절하는데... 이어지는, 당신에 대해 아는 게 없으니 더 알아가고 싶다-는 가슴설레는 말을 듣고 결국 도망쳐버린다.

"저런 멋진 사람이 나같은 사람을 좋아할 리가 없어. 뭔가 착각인 게 분명해!"

초인기 히어로와 그의 고백을 받아버린 비인기 마법소녀의 두근두근 이야기.

altTitles.th: พลันเดอเรอร์ จอมโจรคนเหนือเลข

description.en: In the world of Alcia' where rank is determined by "counts" a young girl named Hina scours the land for the fabled Ace-the legendary hero of the Waste War. With only the last words of her missing mother to guide her search' she wanders from town to town until she meets Licht' a clownish masked vagrant with a count of –999. Girl-crazy and unpredictable' he's the exact opposite of a hero…or at least' that's how he appears…
description.pt: É o ano 305 do calendário Alcian e o mundo é atualmente controlada por ” números”. Todo ser humano ao nascer é marcado com um “Count”. Esta contagem pode ser qualquer coisa: A quantidade de quilômetros que andou, ou a quantidade de pessoas que disseram que sua comida é saborosa. Se sua contagem cair para 0, você será enviado para o abismo. Após contagem da mãe de Hina cair para 0, o seu último pedido foi para Hina procurar pelo lendário Barão Vermelho.
description.ru: 305 год по Альциановому календарю, мир управляется «числами». Каждый человек рождается заклейменный «счётчиком». Этот «счётчик» может быть чем угодно: пройденные километры, количество людей, посчитавших вашу стряпню вкусной. Если «счётчик» падает до нуля, вы попадете в Бездну. После того, «счётчик» матери нашей героини — Хины — перешел грань своих возможностей, её последней просьбой, обращённой к дочери, было: найти легендарного Красного Барона.
description.es-la: Año 305 del calendario Alcián, el mundo se encuentra controlado por los "numeros". Cada ser humano que nace es marcado con un "Contador". Este contador puede subir con cualquier acción; ya sea la cantidad de Kilómetros recorridos, o si alguna persona dice que su comida es sabrosa. Pero si su cuenta se reduce a 0, será enviado al abismo. Antes que la cuenta de la madre de Hina llegará a 0, su ultima voluntad fue que buscara al Legendario Rey Caido...
description.pt-br: No mundo de Alcia, onde a classificação é determinada por "contagens", uma jovem chamada Hina vasculha a terra em busca do lendário Ace - o lendário herói da Guerra do Desperdício.  Com apenas as últimas palavras de sua mãe desaparecida para guiar sua busca, ela vagueia de cidade em cidade até conhecer Licht, um vagabundo mascarado de palhaço com uma contagem de –999.  Louco por garotas e imprevisível, ele é exatamente o oposto de um herói... ou pelo menos é assim que ele parece...

altTitles.en: Just The Two of Them in The Nurse's Office

description.en: A collection of interconnected yuri stories in the nurse's office.

Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.ja: ようかい居酒屋 のんべれケ

description.en:
Girls cry! Laugh! And get harassed! Young female college student, Hino Motogane, starts a part-time job at a small late night Izakaya. However the shop’s clientele – were youkai. These youkais do all kinds of things to their favorite Hino, sometimes they strip her, sometimes they cover her in spit, no matter what they work her to death! After all, she wants her paycheck…. Come on in under the curtain into an Izakaya comedy where girls are full of laughter, tears, sweat, spit, and who knows what fluids that are flying about.  
  


---
description.es:
¡Chicas llorando! ¡Risas! ¡Y acoso sexual! La joven estudiante universitaria, Hino Motogane, comienza un trabajo de medio tiempo en un pequeño Izakaya nocturno. Sin embargo, la clientela de la tienda eran los Youkai. ¡Estos youkai le hacen todo tipo de cosas a Hino, a veces la desnudan o a veces la cubren en saliva sin importar qué! A pesar de todo, ella sigue trabajando ya que solo quiere su cheque de pago… Esta es una comedia de Izakaya donde las chicas están llenas de risas, lágrimas, sudor, saliva y quién sabe qué clase de fluidos más.  
  


---

description.en: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.
description.th:
ผลงานมังงะเรื่องใหม่ของ อ.อิวามิ คิโยโกะ ผู้เขียน "Luminous = Blue"
โลกความเป็นจริงกับโลกออนไลน์ สิ่งที่เปิดเผยให้คนอื่นรู้ได้กับสิ่งที่ต้องการปิดเป็นความลับจากคนรอบข้าง ใครหลายคนอาจมีโลกสองฝั่งแบบนี้อยู่เหมือนกัน
อาซาฮินะ ยูนิ คือหนึ่งในคนที่เป็นแบบนั้น แต่แล้วความลับของเธอก็ถูก ทาคิ ฟูโกะ เพื่อนร่วมชั้นคนหนึ่งล่วงรู้เข้า...

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

altTitles.en: I Want to Escape from Princess Lessons

altTitles.ja: 妃教育から逃げたい私

description.en:
The Prince, my fiancé, was flirting with a lady who was not me. Does that mean he's breaking it off?! "Finally!"   
  
I can finally escape from the strict princess training. As I head back to the countryside the prince chases after me?! He won't break off the engagement?! Why?!  
  
A highly exciting romantic comedy of a prince who chases after his fiancée who has run away.
description.ja:
アスタール王国の王子・クラークの婚約者として、幼い頃から妃教育を受けてきたレティシア。釣りや木登りが大好きなレティシアにとって、王子の婚約者という立場や妃教育は苦痛だった。「いつか他に妃候補が現れたら、婚約破棄してもらう」その野望だけを心の支えに生きてきた。

ある日、王子が見知らぬ女性を連れているのを目撃したレティシアは、ついに婚約破棄が叶うと喜ぶのだが…？

婚約破棄したい妃候補VS結婚したい王子のドタバタ胸キュンバトル開幕!!

title.en: Loop 8-shume wa Shiawase na Jinsei wo ~7-Shuubun no Keikenchi to Daisan Oujo no "Kantei" de Kakusei shita Ore wa, Aibo no Behemoth to Tomo ni Musou suru~

altTitles.ja-ro: ループ8周目は幸せな人生を ～7周分の経験値と第三王女の『鑑定』で覚醒した俺は、相棒のベヒーモスとともに無双する～

altTitles.en: 8th Loop for the Win!: With Seven Lives' Worth of XP and the Third Princess's Appraisal Skill, My Behemoth and I are Unstoppable!

description.en:
This is a story about Remille, an adventurer who died. Specifically, he's died a lot — seven times now, always at the hands of vicious monsters. Every time, though, he's returned to the same day, three years prior. He's tried everything at this point, from sword fighting to magical arts to beast taming, but it always ends the same way. Is there any hope for him in this 8th loop of his life?

Perhaps a chance encounter with Princess Ciel might change things? Her magical eye can see all possible futures—and with Remille's vast stores of XP from seven lives of adventuring, just about anything is possible! Add in the fact that his erstwhile feline friend Catra isn’t exactly what she seems (and how the princess herself wants to party up with him) and this 8th loop might just be the charm!
description.ja:
冒険者のレミルは、１８歳のある日、仲間をかばって命を落とす――。しかし次の瞬間、１５歳のパーティー結成の日にループ していた。そんな人生を６度送った後、７度目には信頼していた仲間たちに裏切られて死んでしまう。

次こそは幸せな人生を送りたいと願う彼の前に現れたのは、「鑑定眼」のスキルを持つ第三王女のシエル。レミルに７周分の経験値が溜まっているのを見抜いた王女は、彼の本当の力を引き出すために次々と無理難題を言いつけてきて……？

description.en: Six members of the occult circle will spend a few days at a ruined love hotel during their summer vacation. Upon arrival they meet two additional people who join them, but in the morning of the second day, a female member was found tied & naked. In addition, the exit was locked by someone and the building became a completely enclosed cage. Will this be a repeat of the 'kodoku' that happened 3 years ago?

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

description.en:
In the world of "Karma," where myths and folklore are timeless echoes of truth, ancient tales gradually unveil their secrets. Each story, once considered mere legend, is now revealed as reality, shaping the world that we live in to this day.
As the story unfolds, we will see these truths that were veiled from humanity's eyes, revealing how these myths have come into existence and why they were hidden away from the modern day.
We follow the narrative through the eyes of Teru and his team, as they delve into the depths of each realm and unravel the mysteries that lie within. From distant lands to mythical beings, every encounter sheds light on the true history of our reality, revealing the path toward understanding our origins.

Co-creator/Illustrator - @artdawgsama
Co-Creator/Writer - @vanillabarss
Writer - @__ willcross __

Ever since his parents died, Watari Nao's life has revolved around his little sister. He forgoes club activities for the sake of spending time with her, leading many of his peers to label him a siscon. But as long as his sister's happy, Nao is willing to shut out any unwelcome comments about himself.  
  
Unbeknownst to Nao, however, a greater danger has resurfaced - one that destroyed his way of life six years ago, and threatens to do so once again.  
  
And that danger, in the form of a girl wielding a garden hoe, will stop at nothing to reclaim what could once have been hers, and hers alone.
description.ru: С тех пор, как его родители умерли, жизнь Ватари Наото вращалась вокруг своей младшей сестры. Он воздерживается от деятельности клуба ради того, чтобы проводить время с ней, в результате чего многие из его сверстников думают, что он влюблён в свою сестру. Но пока его сестра счастлива, Наото готов закрыть глаза на все эти сплетни. Однако ему угрожает та же опасность, что настигла его шесть лет назад. Эта опасность — девушка, которая не уйдет без того, что когда-то принадлежало ей одной!
description.pt-br: Desde que seus pais morreram, a vida de Watari Nao tem girado em torno de sua irmã mais nova. Ele renuncia atividades do clube por causa de passar tempo com ela, levando muitos de seus colegas para rotulá-lo de SISCON. Mas, enquanto sua irmã estiver feliz, Nao está disposto a calar quaisquer comentários indesejáveis sobre si mesmo. Sem o conhecimento de Nao, no entanto, um perigo maior ressurgiu - um que destruiu seu modo de vida, há seis anos, e ameaça fazê-lo mais uma vez, e o perigo vem sob a forma de uma garota empunhando uma enxada de jardim.

title.en: Fairy Tail Gaiden - Kengami no Souryuu

altTitles.ja: FAIRY TAIL外伝 剣咬の双竜
フェアリーテイル外伝 剣咬の双竜

altTitles.en: Fairy Tail: Twin Dragons of Saber Tooth
Fairy Tail Side Story: The Twin Dragons of Sabertooth

altTitles.pt-br: Fairy Tail Gaiden - Os Dragões Gêmeos de Sabertooth

description.en:
The spin-off of the popular fantasy manga "Fairy Tail". Sting, who became the master of Sabertooth, Rogue, Yukino, and Minerva together perform jobs together, but…? What is the danger approaching their guild and the whole continent!? The episode that was not shown in the original story is now being told!!
____________
[Alt Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/fairy-tail-twin-dragons-of-saber-tooth)
description.pt-br: O spin-off do popular mangá de fantasia "Fairy Tail". Sting, que se tornou o mestre de Sabertooth, Rogue, Yukino e Minerva realizam trabalhos juntos, mas…? Qual é o perigo que se aproxima de sua guilda e de todo o continente!? O episódio que não foi mostrado na história original agora está sendo contado!!

description.en:
Are you looking for something new? Something challenging? Something very highly paid? Exterminating monsters is an exciting, fast-paced field that will get you out from behind a desk and into the action. With over 500 magical girl companies now in operation, you’re sure to find a position—and a uniform—that fits. Start your career as a magical girl today!

---
[Viz Official English Volumes](https://www.viz.com/magilumiere-magical-girls-inc)
description.ja: “魔法少女”――それは、誰もが憧れる「職業」である。　就職活動に苦戦する女子大生・桜木カナ。面接先で怪異に巻き込まれたカナは、駆けつけた魔法少女・越谷を手助けしたことをきっかけに、ベンチャー企業『株式会社マジルミエ』に魔法少女として新卒入社することになり…!?
description.ru: Манга про девочку, которая искала работу и попала в корпорацию девочек-волшебниц, борющихся с монстрами.

altTitles.ja: がんまんが〜私たちは大病している〜

altTitles.en: Ganmanga - We Have a Serious Disease

description.en:
Manga artist Shungicu Uchida, whose numerous hit works include the revolutionary child-rearing manga “We are Reproducing,” and “Minami's Lover,” which has been dramatized for TV many times, was suddenly diagnosed with colorectal cancer in 2015...!

The slapstick events leading up to the discovery, hospitalization, and surgery, the mechanism and side effects of anticancer drugs, the physical and environmental changes that ensued, and the turbulent days with her four children before and after the surgery... The author's unique comic essay on the battle against cancer faces cancer head-on and describes it in her trademark frank style.
description.ja: 革命的育児漫画「私たちは繁殖している」や幾度もテレビドラマ化された「南くんの恋人」など多数のヒット作を飛ばしている漫画家・内田春菊に、2015年突如大腸がんとの告知が……！発覚から入院・手術に至るまでのドタバタないきさつ、抗がん剤の仕組みや副作用、わき起こる体や環境の変化、そして術前術後の子4人との激動の日々……。

description.en:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.en: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time

altTitles.th: เกมชีวิตที่สอง ของแรงเกอร์

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable (Official Colored)

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyō na Bōken: Diamond wa Kudakenai
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Diamond wa Kudakenai

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ダイヤモンドは砕けない

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 4 - Diamond is Unbreakable (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第4部 ダイヤモンドは砕けない カラー版

description.en: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand. After their strange meeting, the pair team up to investigate the town’s proliferation of unusual Stands!

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

description.en:
On a Winter night, the painter Hong Cheon Gi, clashes with a man who falls from the sky.
She believe this beautiful looking man--who does not seem to be from this world--is her destined man because of this encounter.
Ha Ram is a man who became blind after being caught up in an unknown accident as a child.
Although he can only see red, after meeting Cheon Gi, he learns the secret surrounding his eyes...

[Translated by Mystic Willow Scans] As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!"Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."

altTitles.fr: Les anecdotes de la Shadows Draconis

description.fr: Salutations jeunes lecteurs et lectrices parvenus dans nos contrées par curiosité. Si certains parmi vous sauront de quoi je parle d'autres non. Alors allez lire "Akuyaku reijou no shitsuji sama drapeau hametsu wa ore ga tsubusasete itadakimasu" car ici n'est à lire que le concentré des chaps bonus pour les rares affamés, lecteurs de ces chapitres. Le spoil, c'est le mal. Alors gardez-vous si vous n'avez pas lu l'œuvre. (Comparer au reste des œuvres où l'on sort un chap par mois. Ici sera publié 1 chapitre tous les deux semaines) Bien à vous et bonne lecture

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Bijutsubu Niwa Mondai Ga Aru!

altTitles.en: This Art Club Has a Problem!

altTitles.ru: С этим клубом точно что-то не так!

altTitles.ja: この美術部には問題がある！

description.en:
A girl with violently too much common sense, a boy whose sole ambition is to draw the perfect 2D bride, an addlebrained ghost member, and their always-sleeping president — what is *wrong* with this art club?!  
  
[Alternative Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01000007010000_68/)
description.ru: Это история о художественнм клубе старшей школы: о мальчике, отдающем свой талант рисованию "идеальных 2D-невест"; девочке, которая к нему неровно дышит; вечно спящем главе клуба; а также таинственной Колетт-сан и неопытной кураторше клуба. Все они странные и забавные люди, и с ними случаются странные и забавные происшествия.

title.en: Outo no Hazure no Renkinjutsushi ~Hazure Shokugyou Datta node, Nonbiri Omise Keiei Shimasu~

altTitles.ja: 王都の外れの錬金術師 ～ハズレ職業だったので、のんびりお店経営します～

altTitles.en: A Tale of a Little Alchemist Blessed by the Spirits

description.en:
Daisy von Preslaria, born in a viscount family that produces excellent magicians, was the only one in the family that was granted the failure job, Alchemist. Since this has happened, she's going to try studying hard and becoming independent as a worthy alchemist!

The five-year-old girl so resolved and began to make potions by trial and error. Thanks to the Appraisal skill that she secretly possessed, let alone failures, her finished products were of such high quality never seen anywhere! She cultivated medicinal herbs, indulged herself in research, went harvesting, and opened a store.
description.ja: 名門魔導師の家系に生まれたのに、ハズレ職の「錬金術師」を与えられてしまったデイジー。が、希少な「鑑定」スキルを持ち、精霊の加護を受ける彼女にとっては天職だった…!?

title.en: How to Hide the Emperor's Child

altTitles.de: Astelle und der geheime Sohn des Kaisers

altTitles.fr: Comment cacher le fils de l'empereur

altTitles.es: Como ocultar al hijo del emperador

altTitles.es-la: Cómo esconder al hijo del emperador

altTitles.mn: Хэрхэн эзэн хааны хүүхдийг нуух вэ?

altTitles.th: วิธีซ่อนทายาทของจักรพรรดิ

altTitles.ja: 皇帝の子供を隠す方法

description.en:
Astelle, the empire's one-day empress brought with her a secret when she left the palace after the divorce: she was pregnant with Emperor Kaizen's child. Six years later, Astelle is living a peaceful life in the countryside with their son until the imperial guards come knocking. Kaizen requires Astelle's consent to receive the key territory of Meilen. With the empire still in turmoil from a rebellion, will Astelle be able to hide her son's identity from these threatening forces, and more importantly, from his father, the emperor?

---
“You never loved me anyway, right?”

Astelle’s long-awaited marriage life ended in a day.

She worked hard to become Kaizen’s wife since she was ten, 
however, the only thing that was left for her was a disgrace as the banished-empress.

She was abandoned by her family; 
She was kicked out by the man she loved, Kaizen.

“Yes. You’re right. I didn’t love you.”

Astelle lied for the last time. 
For the sake of the man who was her reason to live and it was also for him who was her husband for a day.

She thought there is no point tp contact with him again, but-

“I think… I might be pregnant?”

–

Six years later, Astelle, who reunited with Kaizen, lied again.

“You… who is that child?”

“He’s my nephew.”

For the sake of protecting the child.

---

description.ko:
"이혼해 줘, 아스텔.
어차피 당신도 날 사랑한 적 없잖아?"

황제 카이젠만을 바라보며
완벽한 황후가 되기 위해 노력했던 아스텔.
하지만 카이젠의 이혼 요구에
아스텔의 10년이 하룻밤만에 부서졌다.

다시는 황실과 얽히지 않으리라 다짐하며
가족과의 연까지 끊어내고,
시골로 몸을 숨기지만…

"…임신, 하신 것 같습니다."

과연 아스텔은 카이젠과 위협 세력으로부터
황제의 아이, 테오르를 무사히 숨길 수 있을까?

---

description.uk:
"Дай мені розлучення, Астель".
Шлюб Астель не протримався і дня.
Вона тяжко працювала, щоб стати дружиною Кайзена, однак лишилася з ганьбою та прізвиськом вигнаної імператриці.
Родина її покинула.
Як і чоловік, якого вона кохала.
"Так. Твоя правда. Я тебе не кохала".
Збрехала вона наостанок.
Вона вважала, що більше ніколи з ним не зустрінеться, однак...
"Ви носите дитину".
Шість років по тому, побачивши Кайзена, вона знову йому збрехала.
"Що це за дитя?"
"Мій небіж".
Вона має захистити свого сина, що б там не стало.

---

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kokoro no Uchinaru Koe wo Kike!

altTitles.ja: ガバメント（軍用拳銃）を持った少年

altTitles.en: Kaze Shinobu's collection of short stories

description.en:
Violence Becomes Tranquility was published in Heavy Metal Heavy Vol. III #11, March 1980
Heart and Steel was published in Epic Illustrated #10, February 1982

Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!
